FuncDef:
The root-ip command binds a P2MP LSP to an mLDP P2MP tunnel interface.
The undo root-ip command removes the binding between a P2MP LSP and an mLDP P2MP tunnel interface.
No P2MP LSP is bound to an mLDP P2MP tunnel interface by default.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of the ingress of an mLDP P2MP LSP.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the ID of an mLDP P2MP LSP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8192.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To bind a P2MP LSP to an existing mLDP P2MP tunnel interface, run the root-ip command on the ingress.
Prerequisites
An mLDP P2MP tunnel interface has been created and its view has been displayed using the mldp-p2mp-tunnel command.
